mapper.select: SELECT sido_code, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(sido_name) = 2 THEN sido_name WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(sido_name) = 3 THEN SUBSTRING(sido_name, 1, 2) WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(sido_name) = 4 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(sido_name, 1, 1), SUBSTRING(sido_name, 3, 1)) ELSE SUBSTRING(sido_name, 1, 2) END AS sido_name FROM sido

choose.otherwise: SELECT 0 as gugun_code, '전체' as gugun_name, #{city} as sido_code UNION SELECT gugun_code, gugun_name, gugun.sido_code FROM gugun JOIN sido on gugun.sido_code = sido.sido_code WHERE gugun.sido_code = #{city} AND ( CASE WHEN #{city} = 39 THEN gugun.gugun_code >= 3 ELSE gugun.gugun_code >= 1 END )

mapper.select: SELECT ai.content_id, title, addr1, tel, first_image, first_image2, overview, latitude, longitude FROM attraction_info ai LEFT OUTER JOIN attraction_description ad ON ai.content_id = ad.content_id WHERE ai.content_id = #{contentId}

select ai.content_id as content_id, title, first_image from attraction_info as ai, ( select content_id from bookmark group by content_id order by count(*) desc limit 3) as popular where ai.content_id = popular.content_id;

SELECT ranked.age_group, ranked.content_id, attraction_info.title, attraction_info.first_image FROM ( SELECT age_group, content_id, popular_content, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY age_group ORDER BY popular_content DESC) AS row_num FROM ( SELECT age_group, content_id, COUNT(content_id) AS popular_content FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birth) / 365.25) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 20 WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birth) / 365.25) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 30 WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birth) / 365.25) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 40 ELSE 50 END AS age_group, content_id FROM member JOIN bookmark ON member.member_id = bookmark.member_id WHERE member.member_position = '사용자' ) AS subquery GROUP BY age_group, content_id ) AS grouped ) AS ranked JOIN attraction_info ON ranked.content_id = attraction_info.content_id WHERE row_num = 1 ORDER BY ranked.age_group;

select ai.content_id as content_id, title, first_image from attraction_info as ai, ( select content_id from bookmark where bookmark_regdt between DATE_SUB(now(), interval 1 DAY ) and now() group by content_id order by count(*) desc limit 3) as popular where popular.content_id = ai.content_id;

select a.content_id as content_id, a.title as title, a.first_image as first_image, s.sido_name from (select * from sido order by rand() limit 1) s, attraction_info a where a.sido_code = s.sido_code limit 3;
